title: Diophantine Tools (Bounds, Descent, LTE)
content:
Overview

Powerful methods include bounding, infinite descent, and the Lifting The Exponent (LTE) lemma for valuations.

Infinite Descent

Assume minimal solution exists; construct a smaller one to contradict minimality.

LTE

If v_p is the p-adic valuation and p odd prime dividing a-b, then v_p(a^n-b^n)=v_p(a-b)+v_p(n) with mild conditions.

# Quick valuation helper
import math

def v_p(n,p):
    c=0
    while n%p==0:
        n//=p
        c+=1
    return c
print(v_p(2**10-1, 3))  # v_3(1023)

Hard Problem

Find all integers n\ge 1 such that 3^n+1 is divisible by 2n+1.

Solution Sketch

Use LTE on 3^{2k+1}+1 and order arguments modulo small primes; check small cases and apply bounds.
